name: K-Slasher (0.1.9 - Alpha)
description:
Welcome to K-Slasher! (Well, title can change LOL)

Important: This game still under development, servers can get down, bugs may appear, stuff can change. Stay that in mind. Thanks! More Regions Servers soon, when game get ready to launch.

Play -> Enter ou name / Customize Character -> Click in PVP
It will tell you bellow if are server available, or server offline.
If it tells your nothing, please contact me.



Customize your character, choose a weapon, jump into the arena!
Slay other enemys or dummies to get points. (Enemys, more stuff to come.)

WASD - Movement
SHIFT - Run
MOUSE 1 - Slash
MOUSE 2 - Special Ability

Everything is stamina based, so careful with you bar.

Actually game is at version 0.1.8 (Unstable) i'm testing and fixing connectivity issues.
Any feedbacks appreciated! Thanks!
